TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit X509EnhancedKeyUsageExtension extends System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extension

Docs.summary: キーを使用するアプリケーションを表すオブジェクト識別子 \(OID\) のコレクションを定義します。 このクラスは継承できません。

remarks.format:
## 解説 An enhanced key usage \(EKU\) extension is a collection of object identifiers \(OIDs\) that indicate the applications that use the key.
## 例 The following code example demonstrates how to open a user’s personal certificate store and display information about each certificate in the store. This example uses the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509EnhancedKeyUsageExtension> class to display the information.
[!code-cpp[Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions\#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions/CPP/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions\#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions\#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions/VB/sample.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: クラスの新しいインスタンスを初期化します。

remarks.format:
## 解説 Use this method to create a new instance of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509EnhancedKeyUsageExtension> class. After the instance has been created, you can then use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509EnhancedKeyUsageExtension.EnhancedKeyUsages%2A> property to obtain the collection of object identifiers \(OIDs\) that indicate the applications that use the key.
## 例 The following code example demonstrates how to open a user’s personal certificate store and display information about each certificate in the store. This example uses the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509EnhancedKeyUsageExtension> class to display the information.
[!code-cpp[Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions\#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions/CPP/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions\#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions\#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions/VB/sample.vb#1)]

キーを使用してアプリケーションを示すオブジェクト識別子 \(Oid\) のコレクションを取得します。
Docs.value: キーを使用してアプリケーションを示すオブジェクト。

remarks.format:
## 解説
## 例 次のコード例では、ユーザーの個人証明書ストアを開くし、ストアで各証明書に関する情報を表示する方法を示します。 この例では、 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509EnhancedKeyUsageExtension> クラス情報を表示します。
[!code-cpp[Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions\#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions/CPP/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions\#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions\#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions/VB/sample.vb#1)]
